casebody.data:
Summers, Appellant, v. Board of Revision of Cuyahoga County et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Summers v. Board of Revision, 5 Ohio St. 2d 219.]

(No. 39666 Decided March 16, 1966.) *220Messrs. Hribar & Conway and Mr. Harvey 8. Morrison, for appellant. Mr. John T. Corrigan, prosecuting attorney, and Mr. Thomas P. Cyrus, for appellees. Per Curiam.

The decision of the Board of Tax Appeals is reversed and the cause remanded to the board for further consideration in light of Koblenz v. Board of Revision, 5 Ohio St. 2d 214.

Decision reversed.

Tart, C. J., Zimmerman, Matthias, O’Neill and Herbert, JJ., concur. Schneider and Brown, JJ., dissent.
